Timestamp for a log entry may be cut across files


>>> from loggrok.log import RollingIndexLogStream
>>> directory = 'test/data/cuttstamp'
>>> basename = 'test'
>>> stream = RollingIndexLogStream(directory, basename)
>>> for entry in stream:
...     print '-' * 10
...     print entry.header
...     print 'entry =', str(entry)[:-1]
----------
2005-11-22 12:00:00,346 DEBUG 
entry = P
----------
2005-11-22 12:00:00,378 DEBUG 
entry = Q R
----------
2005-11-22 12:15:01,300 DEBUG 
entry = S T
----------
2005-11-22 12:00:00,346 DEBUG 
entry = W X
----------
2005-11-22 12:00:00,378 DEBUG 
entry = Y Z
----------
2005-11-22 12:15:01,300 DEBUG 
entry = Blah Blah
Blah
